name: Top Down Digestive Attack!
description:
Originally made for the gm48 #14 game jam. This was my first ever game jam and I unfortunately wasn't able to submit it on time; that basically means it was a buggy and ugly mess. Not that it's what I would necessarily call "pretty" now, but at least it's a functional game!

Feel free to download and play. I made all assets except for the music in GameMaker Studio Pro, Gimp, and BFXR; music by Bensound (http://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music).
